DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that an investigational refrigerated vaccine with measles, mumps, rubella, and varicella is well tolerated and has similar immune response when compared to a frozen vaccine with measles, mumps, rubella, and varicella.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Frozen Versus Refrigerated MMRV (Combined Measles, Mumps, Rubella, and Varicella) Investigational Vaccine (V221-016)
DOC.criteria: Healthy children 1223 months of age Previously had measles, mumps, rubella, or varicella Compromised immune system
